item.description:
Here's Looking at you, Kid… Humphrey Bogart Film Festival
Thursdays, Sept. 10th–Oct. 29th 7:00 p.m. Senior Center Meeting Room

Join us to celebrate the film career of Humphrey Bogart. Films will begin promptly
at 7:00 p.m. Call 561-8212 for more information. No reservation required.


September 17 To Have and Have Not
September 24 The Big Sleep
October 1 Desperate Hours
October 8 In a Lonely Place
October 15 The African Queen
October 22 Casablanca
October 29 The Caine Mutiny

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Humphry Bogart Film fest Continues
